website_summaries.verdict: The perfect balance between small enough to fit on an apartment balcony, and large enough to provide adequate storage space.
pros: We found the Suncast table provided the perfect amount of storage space to keep your outdoor pillows and blankets safe and dry
It would also work well for storing multiple children's toys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Easy to Assemble, & Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, the ease of assembly, the fact that it's waterproof. It may not look like rattan, but it does exactly what it's meant to do and is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieSez

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Took about 20 minutes, but would have been quicker if I didn't have "assistance".
customer_reviews.author: R. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and storage all in one!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coffee table! Attractive and functional on my deck...and the white color makes it even more striking! Purchased the matching end table as well. One holds all of my outdoor dishes and glasses, and the other holds potting soil and tools. Completely waterproof as well. Arrived quickly and packaged well...couldn't be more pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiikai59

customer_reviews.title: Pieces simply do NOT fit together.
customer_reviews.text: Never got past putting one side on. Sides simply did not fit together. Curved front and back and straight sides do not work; like trying to pound a square peg in a round hole. The curious thing was that on the one side I did get to fit the channel on the back was molded differently to provide more room for the side to fit. Tried shaving the plastic and Vaseline and neither worked. Can not comment on screws and lid as I did not get that far. Others have had no problems so the molding machine operator must have a tough day the day ours was made.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Out with the old, in with the new!
customer_reviews.text: Luv, luv, luv this “chest”! I bought this item to replace a twenty yr old woven “bamboo” hamper that was failing in its structure. Since Suncast products are built to withstand the elements, I figured this would last another twenty yrs plus, since it is inside in the master bedroom. It is bigger than the previous unit, so it holds more bath linen and bed linen. It was easy to put together without hubby’s help! The white color brightens the corner area as well as makes the room look neater and bigger. And the price was better than the Big Z! Thanks, Amazon, for offering this very useful, yet stylish product!
customer_reviews.author: Cristinota

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy for storage.
customer_reviews.text: For what I wanted, this is great. It didn't take long to assemble and all pieces were accounted for. The color is a true, bright white. I noticed some prior reviews indicated the lid would not stay latched. I had that problem initially but found that the screws on the hinges were too tight. By loosening them a little, it shuts and latches just fine. It stores cushions just great. I don't have it out in the elements, but just in case of water getting near the table, I placed a sheet of 5 mil plastic around the bottom and inside. I've only had this a week and this review is based on that. If it changes, I will amend.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great deck storage...not critter proof.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this deck storage table and use it for storing birdseed outside. The little uninvited critters can't open the lid; however, after a couple weeks, the little bandits (Raccoons​) have decided to make their own way in and have chewed 2 corners first and last night the middle of the top. They are not in yet, but I expect it won't be long.....
customer_reviews.author: TisInow

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service / Product Design
customer_reviews.text: Beware these boxes can't be repaired since they can't be disassembled. I have bought three boxes from this company and my experiences with one of them has made me look that the design of all of them. If we buy stuff that can't be repaired or dissembled for a move then the product must be judged on its weakest cheapest plastic link and this one has plenty of them. I hope none of these cheap plastic parts break! The company told me that I need to buy a new box instead of after a kid rushed assembly error.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy Spud Bug

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just okay, for this pricepoint. Product was shipped well and the box had no damage. Upon opening the product, I observed several scratches, cosmetic defects, and warping on various parts of the coffee table. Due to the box being in pristine condition, I am led to believe that either this was a refurbished item being sold as new, or that there are problems on the manufacturing end. After assembly, the table seems sturdy enough despite not being perfectly level due to warping. Time will tell how this item holds up. Will continue to update.
customer_reviews.author: LimFu

customer_reviews.title: Zero Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Metal reinforcements were haphazardly pre-installed. Not properly aligned. Screws that completely missed the mating surface and were sticking up into thin air. Had to completely remove the reinforcments and drill new holes to correct the many errors in the factory installation. Will not buy this product again. Very disappointed in Suncast for letting the quality good far down hill.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, solid closure, seat in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had my coffee table for about 3 months now, I use this for holding the extra rack and pizza pan for my XL ceramic grill as well as charcoal, my kids sand bucket and chalk and some other odd and ends and it's got plenty of room left. I weigh about 205 and have sat on it multiple times when our other chairs were in use. The closure snaps shut and is solid enough to keep small children from opening it. Has a good look to it but even with fancy design it's not like you are ever going to not know its plastic. Will definitely be buying more of this series when we expand our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Hassle to assemble, but looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Now that it is assembled, I love it. Putting it together....well, that is another story. Took over an hour. It would have been about 20 minutes had the manufacturer did two things. First identify which way was up on the side panels. Second, predrill the holes for the screws. Also, I have an extra screw. Not sure if that was meant to be or if I missed something. Let's just say after finally getting this thing put together, I MAY have treated my frustration with some 'mommy juice." If not for the assembly frustrations, I would have given this a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for package delivery on an uncovered porch. It gets 4 stars for 2 reasons, 1. It is difficult to open we had to put 30 lbs weights inside to hold it down to open it, the latches latch very tightly. We now leave it slightly ajar and it is still water proof. 2. We puting on the hinges, and working on the lid, the screw holes do not have enough room to really get a screwdriver in and get the screw in straight. This was the hardest part, and took several tries, to get the screw in straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screw holes aren't pre-drilled
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice enough for what it is, and it was pretty easy to put together. However, it was all scratched up when it came, and none of the holes for the screws were pre-drilled. I didn't have a power drill, so I had to put my entire body weight on half of a pair of scissors to poke holes in the thick plastic to get the screws to go in. That is incredibly dangerous! But, on the plus side, it does what it was meant to do, and looks as nice as it can doing it. :)
customer_reviews.author: caj

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Instructions were easy to follow. HOWEVER, it was missing one of the spring clips for the lid. Website support was not easy to navigate. Ended up calling and had to wait approx. 1/2 hour on hold for customer service. They did send me the missing clip. I like the product but hate the terrible phone wait.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Great storage area. Need more Precision in aligning screw holes
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I had purchased a Suncast loveseat with storage. Needed to put it together and it went together rather easily. But I needed more storage. So I ordered this table. It did not go as well because the screw holes were not aligned properly. We managed to get it together after some struggling. Other than that, it's a great storage area and it does support having someone sit on it. So all in all I like it
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not typical Suncast quality.
customer_reviews.text: Debated on returning this however it took too long to assemble and I didn’t want to have to take it apart. I had a difficult time putting this together as the sides were not meeting correctly. Finally got it together but the top latches don’t meet or work correctly. Very disappointed as Suncast containers are usually high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Easy to put together. When attaching the hinge for the lid, I used some washers because the hinge sat too low on the edge and the lid would not close. The washers raised it about 1/4 inch, the lid closes perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: Fusciah

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something with a nice capacity and was sturdy, this fit the bill! We actually use it as a laundry hamper and are very happy with the amount of clothes it holds. It’s a nice piece of furniture and we really like the heavy duty lid. If you’re using it outside, you’ll be happy with the lid, since it won’t fly up and it won’t get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jennine

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This box was fairly easy to assemble except for the lid latches, but fooled around with them and finally got them to work. It matches the 40” cabinet I bought a year ago perfectly. Very sturdy and perfect size for our patio essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable item.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived well packaged and on time. The reason why I give it three stars is that the pieces basically are meant to interlock together, and they don't do so very well. Assembly time is short because there are only few pieces to put together. I believe the material should be stronger and quality control better. It is nice to look at once completed. I can't say that I would buy it again, but will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: AlfonsoC

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the box looks good and worked well
customer_reviews.text: This pool deck storage unit worked well for about 2.5 years but after that the metal hinges rusted through due to the muratic acid used in the pool. Just the mere fact that the acid was in the container and was not leaking was enough to destroy the hinges entirely. Other than that the box looks good and worked well. Placing the acid inside the box even though it was in a sealed container still damaged the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Better then wicker
customer_reviews.text: I have family that’s purchased expensive wicker and it literally falls apart after a few years. I liked the “wicker look” of this and thought I would give it a try. I’m very happy! It has tons of storage and I’ve actually sat on it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alimay414

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw- READ BEFORE PURCHASING!
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is very sturdy- EXCEPT where you lift the top of it up. It’s like it’s hollow in just that one part of the product. Why?!?! It dented upon the first use and over time will crack and water will get in. The thing looks so nice on my patio too. I’m sad I will have to return it. Don’t say I didn’t warn you;)
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: We live in SE Alaska, Its always raining and ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in SE Alaska, Its always raining and wet. This is WATER TIGHT! no joke. we live on the ocean and have been threw some nasty storms, Its always dry as can be when we lift the lid! We will bye more from Suncast Elements for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Unit.
customer_reviews.text: It takes quite a bit of effort to put this item together, but it is nice an sturdy, The only thing about this unit is that the manufacturer does not take care to handle package the prices so that they are not scoffed or scratched. This particular piece way only scoffed inside, but I would like everything to look like new. At least is didn't have any scratches on the outside lid like one of the side tables.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Suncast is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a part of a larger outdoor remodel of our backyard patio, and this was the first piece in. I had it assembled in about 15mins and I was really impressed with the durability of the pieces and how easily everything went together. Had no missing parts or pieces, so that was good, and once assembled, this piece by itself added flare to our back yard. I would totally recommend this piece and all Suncast products. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Marvb67

customer_reviews.title: Nice little box.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little storage box. Can't do much else with it. Can't sit on it or use it as a planter (unless you keep removing the plants to get in to it). We've had it a year outside in Florida weather. The top warped a little bit but hardly noticeable other than that it's held up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This little storage table is perfect for my deck. Repels rain. Matches my furniture. I had no trouble assembling it. I've bought Suncast products before and am happy with everything I've purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: R-I-D-I-C-U-L-O-U-S-L-Y Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son and I worked on putting this together for a good hour....the panels don't slide together the way they're supposed to, even when we added great force (he's 16 and very strong). We ended up using a hammer protected by a cloth, but the plastic still began to split as we struggled with it. Finally we got it sort of together -- the bottom slide parts did not go together, but we gave up -- and it's holding together reasonably well, even without the screws or the latches installed. I love the look of it and also need some end tables, but I would be nuts to order more of the same. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Avallon

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I am surprised at how well made for the price. Mostly easy to put together. A mallet and a drill are about all you need- I bought several pieces from this line- all are comfortable and well made. I would have given 5 stars, there is a minor flaw and physics may just be the issue- one end of the table pools water, as we use it out by our pool, we live in Florida, it rains often enough. Not a deal breaker and I'm not sure it could be avoided. Very satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Easy to put together, a couple of the screws in the top are at a really odd angle but other than than, only a few minutes to put together. Had it about a month, seems sturdy enough for seating as well. We use it for pool toys mostly so I don't know how water resistant it is to rain. We like it enough that we'll probably order another one.
customer_reviews.author: LCamp

customer_reviews.title: Great UPS/Fed ex delivery box
customer_reviews.text: Great for my needs. I bought this for a front porch UPS/Fed Ex delivery box. Waterproof and durable. Keeps packages from sitting on my front porch and out of view from porch thieves. Not 5 stars for assembly process; which was a little bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: 10kster

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage table. It was SO EASY to assemble. I have rheumatoid arthritis (pain and weakness prevent me from doing a lot of tasks) and I only needed a little help getting it together. So far, the table has held up nicely. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage coffee table for the deck. It made it through several storms and kept the pillows inside dry! I wish the top didn’t collect water when it rains, but that’s pretty minor.
customer_reviews.author: teamlb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage Table
customer_reviews.text: It has stayed dry inside. I'd say it would fit about 4 pillows. It wasn't big enough to fit any cushions but nicely keeps toys and candles dry. The water does pool on the top a little so after a rain I have to open it up to get the water off the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine P

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor storage with some quirks
customer_reviews.text: It is a tight fit to put together and that is a good thing. We have had a lot of rain since I have bought it and it has remained water proof. Plenty of room inside for bird seed, blankets, and other random outdoor stuff. I had to take a star off because the lid did not close properly for the first month. I had to push it into place from the back. I still have to guide the clasps each time I close it and this results in closing it on my fingers a few times a week. Aside from the lid issues this is a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a wicker table that had gotten torn up. This isn't fancy, but it should hold up outside, and will do the job for us. Came on time, and didn't need to be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: You asked me what I think!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience...took two hours to assemble as some of the panels were warped and did not fit properly. Lid does not close on one side...had to grind off some plastic to allow for clearance on the rear panel. It is not our first experience with self assembly purchases, however, this is the worst by far. We have assembled beds, chairs, end tables, tables, etc. This is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The sides were not properly aligned. They did not "snap" into place. I am assuming there's a bad run of these - or - that the positive reviews are fake. This was absolutely horrible to put together. I have put together many, many types of furniture in the past and this was the worst. I see by the other negative reviews, that I am not alone with this issue. I would not, by any means, recommend this product. I ended up returning this item as it's defective. Hopefully they will get these defects off their shelves. I think it would be a nice bin if it could be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kealani Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size as an outdoor coffee table. Good storage to hold throw pillows. Flat top so drinks don't fall over. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Victor F.

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: We wanted it to store the furniture covers but it doesn’t close well. Looks like it was warped but we don’t want to m SS around with returning since its all out together.
customer_reviews.author: Ella B

customer_reviews.title: easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered this morning. Assembled this afternoon. Assembly was easy; only phillips head screwdriver required. Even one non-mechanically inclined woman can put it together!
customer_reviews.author: msmith

customer_reviews.title: Bad assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I tried to assemble this per the instructions. Must be written by non English speaking individual. We were able to get it together well enough to use as a table and storage but gave up trying to in stall the hinges for the lid. Just lift lid off to access interior. It is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: P Parmley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this one, after returning a different item because it was impossible to put together. This was perfect and EASY to assemble....less than a half hour and NO swearing....
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G. Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This completes my set of four pieces. The quality is awesome. Assembly was easy. The storage in the unit is going to make deck-living far better for us come summer.
customer_reviews.author: Teaching Assistant

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The materials are appropriate to a sturdy structure. It was relatively easy to assemble. I use it on my deck and it is subject to wind, rain, and other inclemency's of the weather; and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: We have had bad storms in Texas and I like that i could ...
customer_reviews.text: The table came well packaged. Very stirdy and attractive as pictured. Te main problem in assembly was in spots there no predrilled holes. You cannot put this together without a power drill or you would be doing it for weeks. I still cannot get latch assembly to work to keep lid locked but I am not unhappy overall with the table. We have had bad storms in Texas and I like that i could store my two chair pillows in there out of the rain.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and pictured
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy table w/storage. It's big enough for my purpose and the material is like a thick heavy duty plastic. I can sit on this.
customer_reviews.author: MLionheart

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whole set. Well made. Attractive. Durable. Easy to assemble. Washes easily with a hose. Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Top no longer closes
customer_reviews.text: Top warped and no longer closes after first year. The storage unit is on a covered porch out of the sun and rain. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Keppel

customer_reviews.title: This is a super nice coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice coffee table. It looks good, lid opens and closes shut easily, and it keeps out moisture and bugs. Despite what some have posted, it is really not difficult to assemble. However, be sure to use an electric/power screwdriver. It will be a challenge trying to screw through the tough resin/plastic simply by hand. I'm glad I purchased it and the companion end tables. They add a nice touch of class to my deck.
customer_reviews.author: "Little Smitty"

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. We use them on the boat as benches along the transom and they are just perfect. True bright white plastic and they really don't look tacky or cheap. They wipe clean with a damp towel. They keep our stowed items dry and also double as extra seating. You cant go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: EmptyPenName

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn't seem to let water in when it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, doesn't seem to let water in when it rains. It is slightly small for all the cushions I had thought I was going to be able to store during winter months, and there's two "latches" that comes with it, that is impossible to screw into it's designated spot so a star fell off due to that. It can definitely be used without the latches so no need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pet owner with 3 kids

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the reviews for this product were not great in regards to the assembly. I had absolutely no problem assembling it. I would say that it took about a half hour. If you've put together any furniture, this one isn't rocket science. I would use a power screwdriver to go through the plastic because the holes aren't predrilled. I would recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sassyj

customer_reviews.title: it looks great and is size I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Lid was not assembled correctly at maufacturer. When we put it together, it hits inside lip and will not close all the way. Too much hassle to send back. Darn it. But, it looks great and is size I wanted. Put underneath awning where it won't have to be watertight.
customer_reviews.author: ppearce

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I needed an outdoor coffee table that doubles as storage. Fits my chair covers and garden knick knack! Only issue was with lid...the tabs to keep it shut didn’t fit well. Removed them and it fits ok now!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Good entry-level piece, though not winning any beauty contests.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting it to be as "plasticky" as it is. It's reminiscent of those blocky plastic kitchen sets that kids play house with. But it's functional, it seems well-built for the price, and it does the job for now. I'm sure that in the next year or so I'll want to upgrade to "real" outdoor coffee table, and when that time comes this piece will become a nice looking deck box.
customer_reviews.author: Krispy Kritter

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Went together super easy with an electric screwdriver in about ten minutes. Most of the panels slide together. Love it on my patio, holds my grill stuff and gardening tools that were previously just piled up. Keep my straw gardening hat on top and it really looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: the jer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time however there were no assembly instructions (and I couldn't find any online) and the top was scratched. Okay we thought we’d make it work anyway then noticed one of the screw holes was broken. The side where the screw should go is completely damaged, as if someone else tried to make it work...made it worse and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Campos

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I bought it because of one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I bought it because of one of my cats-she sharpens her claws on everything. She doesn't like resin, so I got it to store my extra sheets and other linens. Super easy to put together, although I did have to tap the screw holes, especially on the lid. I was able to put it together by myself and it fits in my small house. Thinking about buying more of this stuff-it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality and won rust
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. No metal so won't rust. Table is heavy gauge plastics pvc and very durable and doesnt blow around on my porches end in strong ocean winds. I plan to buy the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: NJ - CRE

customer_reviews.title: Great value-priced product. Durable and water-tight. Suncast brand only.
customer_reviews.text: we cant say enough about the durability, functionality and water-tightness of Suncast storage. We have several but we also incorporate with nice patio furniture so it balances out the "plastic" storage pieces. we downsized and live in FL so having outdoor storage for floats, towels, cushions and pillows is a must. We've had a couple pieces for approx. 3 years and they all look as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Matches the wicker furniture
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks on the porch as it nearly matches the wicker furniture we already have on the porch. I was disappointed that not all the cushions fit inside though (loveseat and 2 chairs seat cushions and 5 small decorative pillows) as it was not as big inside as I expected, but I guess that is my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Very bad .
customer_reviews.text: Terrible coffee table. Front and back are warped so bad the sides will not fit into the slots . Want to return this thing and I would have to pay shipping on 35 pounds plus restocking fee. One corner had a small hole in it . I believe from the die that makes it. I really can’t give it or the manufacturer a single star . Turn your back on this product.

customer_reviews.title: Storage end table
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful on our deck. just the right height to set drinks on. Use for coffee table with storage
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I purchased two as storage for chair, tables and lounge covers. I use them beside a lovely Victorian styled cast iron settee. I put them together myself. You do need a battery operated screw driver, but if I can do it anyone can. Only change I would make in the design is a solid top to alleviate water standing around the perimeter of the top.
customer_reviews.author: Memorymaker

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: You should have pretty heavy tools to assemble it, and it is not always easy or intuitive. Especially difficult if putting screws in the closing clickers. Otherwise the items lloks like described
customer_reviews.author: Mark S (Detroit, MI)

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with this product. It was very straightforward to put together, and only took about 20 minutes. The lid clasps shut tightly, so the contents are secure. I store my furniture and grill cover inside it, so that everything looks neat and tidy when we're sitting outdoors. The table is sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth a "1" for what it cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. It's made out of plastic and the pieces are supposed to fit together.......NOT. My husband had to cut the plastic to make it fit and I I had to hold them tightly together while he hammered them in. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gregorin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine used and it honestly looks like it’s brand new. It was kind of a pain in the butt to put together, for some reason the pieces were difficult to slide together. I think it’s the perfect size for our porch. I’m using it for summer toy storage. Also no water has gotten in it when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: This is Nicely made. Great storage. I would recommend. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Storage for Outdoor toys
customer_reviews.text: We use this as storage for my daughter's outdoor toys. It fits a lot, and is fairly deep, but not so deep that my two year old can't take stuff out on her own. It was outside during a week long rain period and was surprised to find that all her toys were dry and no rain seeped in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Nye

customer_reviews.title: It works great and no water has gotten in the inside thus ...
customer_reviews.text: Was what we expected. It works great and no water has gotten in the inside thus far. My husband and I did not have any trouble putting together the storage unit as some had mentioned in the various reviews. The directions were written by someone who doesn't understand the English language but if you've got 1/2 a brain, it's not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: maryann ostrenga

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, solid furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this Suncast furniture looks! Put together the coffee table two chairs with minimal assistance in 4 hours or so. Will review again over time to report on longevity in new Update: so far so good! This survived a new England winter with no signs of wear. Items inside stayed relatively dry and clean. Changing this to a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Voog

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, nicer looking than others because of the basketweave pattern. Easy to assemble, sturdy hinges. Holds a lot of patio items- charcoal, hose, mop bucket, etc. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Have been using it for several months and it still looks like new. The only reason I didn't give it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this table and the matching end table. It is exactly as described. Have been using it for several months and it still looks like new. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the top is a little difficult to open, but on the other hand it seals well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use as a toy box, it’s classy looking and tough. Price was a little steep but I do like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Janssens

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together but the lid would not close. Followed and double checked all of the directions but it would not sit right. Called customer service, but they were useless. I am so disappointed in the quality and support. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Langston

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service (Suncast)
customer_reviews.text: Great product - exactly what we were looking for, BUT... Customer Service at Suncast is beyond terrible. One part missing in box - called 5 times, emailed twice - still nothing. Considering returning it even though it is what we were after.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Organized my deck!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids toys and pillows on my deck. Lid is snug and waterproof. Had some light red marks in places. Soft scrub did the trick. My son in law put it together for me... said it took about twenty minutes. He did use an electric drill to drive the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Fuller

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, the indent at the top collects water and dirt/debris on the deck. Need to clean it with a brush and soapy water occasionally. Once assembled, the top does not want to close exactly the way it should, but still works with a little TLC. It is just the right size to fit in front of our two Club Chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to put together and beautiful. It my second suncast item and I recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GABRIELE RADTKE

customer_reviews.title: ... handy but was able to put this together rather easily while following the directions
customer_reviews.text: I am not very handy but was able to put this together rather easily while following the directions. We did have a problem where one of the panels was not cut right. Customer service was great i emailed a picture and they sent out a replacement piece. It is perfect for storage, and so far has kept our cushions dry.
customer_reviews.author: richard cirillo

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, hinges rested and the lid bowed and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad design, hinges rested and the lid bowed and will not shut properly. Tried to call company and phone line was always busy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Warped from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chest for a while. It lasted for about a year before it began to warp. It is in full sun most of the day. The picture shown is after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great garden storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect garden supplies storage, and nice coffee table in the yard
customer_reviews.author: The Min

customer_reviews.title: WENT TO URGENT CARE
customer_reviews.text: Pieces genuinely did not fit. I sliced open my finger attempting to put it together and required 5 stitches!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Detrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for porch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my porch. I put all of my holiday decorations in it. There is plenty of room for lots of bulky ideas
customer_reviews.author: Jebby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage.  Keeps up dry and handy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage chest. Keep small cannisters of powder insect killer and small containers with fertilizer pellets in the chest.
customer_reviews.author: J D down south

customer_reviews.title: Could have been good.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with two tops and no bottom. Could not get support from manufacturer. Disappointed in Suncast, which normally has great products.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Gómez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sturdy,great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised, looks great and very sturdy. Assembly was easy and took about 20 minutes. Made in America with a 5 year warranty. You won't find a better item for the price anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Does not align and latch properly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty straight forward and easy. Lid not properly aligned causing it to not latch properly. Tried to refit multiple times. Still will not stay latched--not going to last long like this and probably will leak. Larger deck box by Suncast that I bought years ago is much better. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition to my Patio
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my patio. It's a bit cheesy looking as a coffee table, so I have moved it into a corner. It does however, have nice storage space, and makes for a good additional table/seat. I had a friend put it together, and with an electric drill, it didn't even take him ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lemur

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is. Molded plastic. But it is size that I wanted and suits my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: golden reader

customer_reviews.title: Indoors for me, worked excellent !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now is my indoor Coffee table.. Nobody notice . Pets cant damage. Looks great, and storage all my magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junky
customer_reviews.text: Arrived scratched up. Instructions for the hinged top very poor. I have purchased other suncast items that were fine. This was not. Kind of disgusted; but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Holds my chair cushions to keep out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE ALBERS

customer_reviews.title: ... gives me the storage I need and loos much better than plastic tubs
customer_reviews.text: This gives me the storage I need and loos much better than plastic tubs. The price was good, but the construction is a little sloppy; with screw holes too small for the screws so I can't close it tight or I';d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maxma

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for the cockpit of our boat - it's very luxurious looking while still being exceptionally functional. I use it to store clean towels inside - as we use the top to set out food and drink, I found it was necessary to purchase drawer liner and cut it to size to use as an anti-slip for the dishes. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: maxxcody

product_meta.title: Suncast Elements 30-Gallon End Table with Storage - Lightweight Resin Outdoor Storage Patio and Coffee Table for Cushions, Gardening Tools and Toys - Store Items on Patio - Java
product_meta.description: Color:JavaThe Suncast plastic storage end table container is an attractive and highly versatile solution for use throughout your patio, home, and yard. The chest design and hinged lid allow for easy access to your decor, pillows, and other patio accessories. With a holding capacity of 30 gallons (34" x 20" x 18"), the wicker end table is compact and space-efficient, easily tucked away. The storage table works as either a side table or centerpiece with design potential for you to explore, and the durable, all weather resin construction is sturdy yet easy to move and rearrange for however you use your patio The weatherproof body will resist fading, while the rain water flows off of the box without pooling to keep your belongings dry and mildew-free.
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR STORAGE TABLE: Beautiful plastic outdoor end table has a 30-gallon capacity for all kinds of patio accessories!
DURABLE: Water-resistant poly resin construction resists fading and rust to keep your box looking new for years to come
DECORATIVE: Java wicker pattern compliments many exterior colors and enhances the look of your outdoor decor
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Lid flips open on hinges for easy access to your items. Rain water flows off of the box to keep your belongings dry and free from mildew and rust
MEDIUM SIZED: Coffee table measures 34" x 20" x 18", the perfect size for your outdoor space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars593 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
